end.!doc: Evaluates a list of conditions and returns one of multiple possible result expressions.

otherwise.!doc: Evaluates a list of conditions and returns one of multiple possible result expressions.

when.!doc: Evaluates a list of conditions and returns one of multiple possible result expressions.

agg.!doc: Compute aggregates by specifying a series of aggregate columns.

avg.!doc: Compute the mean value for the numeric column for each group.

count.!doc: Count the number of rows for each group.

max.!doc: Compute the max value for the numeric column for each group.

mean.!doc: Compute the average value for the numeric column for each group.

min.!doc: Compute the min value for the numeric column for each group.

sum.!doc: Compute the sum for the numeric column for each group.

orderBy.!doc: Defines the ordering columns in a WindowSpec.

partitionBy.!doc: Defines the partitioning columns in a WindowSpec.

rowsBetween.!doc: Defines the frame boundaries, from start (inclusive) to end (inclusive).

asc.!doc: Returns a sort expression based on ascending order of the column.

desc.!doc: Returns a sort expression based on descending order of the column.

groupBy.!doc: Groups result rows by the values in one or more columns.

lag.!type: fn(value_expression: Column, offset_value: Column, opt_default_value_expression: Column) -> Column
lag.!doc: Ordered analytic functions calculate an aggregate or non-aggregate value on a window of rows within a group of rows.

lead.!type: fn(value_expression: Column, offset_value: Column, opt_default_value_expression: Column) -> Column
lead.!doc: Ordered analytic functions calculate an aggregate or non-aggregate value on a window of rows within a group of rows.

orderBy.!doc: Creates a WindowSpec with the ordering defined.

partitionBy.!doc: Creates a WindowSpec with the partitioning defined.

trim.!doc: Trim the spaces from both ends for the specified string column.

when.!doc: Evaluates a list of conditions and returns one of multiple values.
